apify_actions.name: APIFY_CREATE_ACTOR
apify_actions.description: Tool to create a new actor with specified configuration. use when you need to initialize a fresh actor programmatically before publishing or running it.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_CREATE_TASK
apify_actions.description: Tool to create a new actor task with specified settings. use when you need to configure or schedule recurring actor runs programmatically.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_CREATE_TASK_WEBHOOK
apify_actions.description: Tool to create a webhook for an actor task. use when you need external notifications about task run events (e.g., completion or failure) in downstream systems.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_DELETE_ACTOR
apify_actions.description: Tool to delete an actor permanently. use when you need to remove an actor by its id or username~actorname. confirm before calling.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_GET_ACTOR
apify_actions.description: Tool to get details of a specific actor. use when you need actor metadata by id or username/actorname.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_GET_DEFAULT_BUILD
apify_actions.description: Tool to get the default build for an actor. use after specifying the actor id; optionally wait for the build to finish before returning.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_GET_LIST_OF_BUILDS
apify_actions.description: Tool to get a list of builds for a specific actor. use when you need paginated access to an actorâ€™s build (version) history.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_GET_LIST_OF_RUNS
apify_actions.description: Tool to get a list of runs for a specific actor. use when you need to paginate through runs and optionally filter by status before processing run data.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_GET_LIST_OF_TASK_RUNS
apify_actions.description: Tool to get a list of runs for a specific actor task. use when you need to paginate through task runs and optionally filter by status.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_GET_LIST_OF_TASKS
apify_actions.description: Tool to fetch a paginated list of tasks belonging to the authenticated user. use when you need to browse or sort tasks created by the user.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_GET_LIST_OF_TASK_WEBHOOKS
apify_actions.description: Tool to get a list of webhooks for a specific actor task. use when you need to review or paginate webhooks after creating or updating a task.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_GET_LOG
apify_actions.description: Tool to retrieve logs for a specific actor run or build. use after initiating an actor run or build when you need to inspect execution logs.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_GET_OPEN_API_DEFINITION
apify_actions.description: Tool to get the openapi definition for a specific actor build. use when you need the api schema for code generation or analysis.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_RESURRECT_RUN
apify_actions.description: Tool to resurrect a finished actor run. use when you need to restart a completed or failed run. deprecated endpoint; may be removed in future.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_RUN_ACTOR
apify_actions.description: Tool to run a specific actor asynchronously. use when you need to trigger an actor run without waiting for completion and retrieve its run details immediately.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_RUN_ACTOR_SYNC
apify_actions.description: Tool to run a specific actor synchronously with input and return its output record. use when immediate actor results are needed; runs may timeout after 300 seconds.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_RUN_ACTOR_SYNC_GET_DATASET_ITEMS
apify_actions.description: Tool to run an actor synchronously and retrieve its dataset items. use when immediate access to run results is needed.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_RUN_TASK
apify_actions.description: Tool to run a specific actor task asynchronously. use when you need to trigger a task run without waiting for completion and immediately retrieve its run details.

apify_actions.name: APIFY_UPDATE_TASK_INPUT
apify_actions.description: Tool to update the input configuration of a specific actor task. use when you need to modify a scheduled tasks input before execution.
